runs.comm: forward defensive to a slow loosener, drops into the on side, no more than a few yards, and a scurried single to loud cheers
back of a length, on off stump, Prior half forward and defends to point
fuller, driven but not timed, his top hand comes off the bat as he plays the stroke and it dribbles to mid-off
wider, 85mph, no shot offered

dropped into the leg side, a quick single, Maddy, the non striker,  ran in a straight line and Lee swerved across the pitch and the two collided ... Maddy got home safely and it was Lee who was left on the turf
short, cut over backward point, third man round quickly to field
wide, slanted across Prior, a swing and a mess and our lipreading expert points out he said something very uncouth
on the button, blocked into the leg side but the field are wise to that after two singles in the last over and they swoop
a skip down the pitch and Prior smashes that for six over extra cover ... a shimmy to leg as well and that flew
wristy flick to backward point who makes a scrambling stop
plopped into the covers, soft hands so the ball dribbles no more than ten yards, and that allows a comfortable single
bat and pad together defensively, and again they settle for a well-run single into the off side
wide, Maddy looks to cut but it's too close to him and he ends up much too cramped
same again, and this one cuts back as well so he gets even more cramped and once more misses
bouncer at 89mph, fast and nasty, Maddy onto it quickly and he hooks for a one-bounce four, quite safe and he picked that up in a trice
as limp as the last shot was aggressive ... semi-nothing prod outside the off stump which he misses
back and pushed towards extra cover, real tip and run, and he did well to take all the pace of that
wide and a flamboyant drive which Prior gets nowhere near
on leg stump, eased round the corner
Prior gives Clark the charge and whips the ball over short fine leg ... once it was over him it was always four
slower ball, Prior goes for a mow and misses
slower again, placed to the left of a diving cover but third man in with speed and that prevents the second
back of a length, placed through where the slips would have been and Gilchrist zooms off to field
Prior turns the ball off his hips square on the leg side, fine leg round to collect
again Prior gives the charge and slashes it over the cover ring, not much power and Symonds fields a few yards inside the rope
worked square on the leg side
Maddy's turn to have a mow ... net result, another miss
Maddy back, lets the ball hit the bat and a single as it plops into the on side
a charge too far, Prior gets cramped as Johnson follows him and the ball, which hit high up on the bat, hangs for a long time before falling to Bracken at wide mid-on
pushed between cover and extra cover, well placed but not well enough
Wright can do no more than play the ball defensively straight back down the pitch
wide, cut with real oomph and Clarke makes an excellent stop at point
a swing, a miss, and he loses his off stump ... but it matters only in that England didn't get a run off it
short, Maddy leans back and tries to work it over where slip would be but misses
again no run ... this is good bowling
full toss and Maddy takes advantage, smacking it a yard or two to the right of wide mid-on who has no chance
tries to nurdle to third man but he misses
wide with a bit of bounce and another lean back, heave, and miss
again he leans back and swings, the ball arcs high over the covers and plops soggily into the outfield
short, Wright shimmies to the off but mistimes and the ball trickles to mid-on
Johnson swings it across Wright who slogs and gets a thick outside edge, Gilchrist does the rest
and that's why ... Pietersen plays a classic off drive - Test, ODI or Twenty20, that was a super shot
turned to deep backward square leg
fullish, Pietersen drives off the back foot but straight to mid-off
slower ball as Pietersen does the light fandango in the crease, he eventually creams the ball to the man in the deep on the cover rope
Maddy helps a leg-side half-volley on its way for a one bounce four behind square
driven high and straight but Maddy deceived by the slower ball ... no power in the shot and deepish mid-off takes a routine catch
pushed firmly to the man on the cover boundary
bouncer and Collingwood ducks under it
driven, but right at extra cover, never a chance of a run
driven, Symonds at extra cover makes a good diving stop to his right
by the time the ball was bowled Pietersen was standing outside off stump, but Johnson wise to it and KP was still beaten outside off ...
short, no timing in the shot and it barely has the legs to make it off the square ...mid-on round to field
another swing and a miss ... there's too much heaving and not enough hitting
wide and chased, a thick edge zooms over the slip and third man fields
uber-wristy flick round the corner to keep the strike
full toss, Pietersen aims a big swing but again mistimes it and a thin edge into his pads is all he can manage
driven up to long-on
another full toss, Pietersen, still skipping around the crease, waits and drives straight inches to the right of the bowler
Collingwood steps to the off and swings that over midwicket for a one-bounce four
ugly long hop, Collingwood waits and hammers that behind square where he has spotted the hole int he field
worked into the leg side, the man is in quickly from the rope and cuts off the second
driven out straight for an easy single
overstepping, leg-side full toss and Pietersen drives out to long-on
attempted yorker veering towards middle, but  missed his length only by a little bit and Collingwood crashes right in front of midwicket
low full toss, on off, and a huge wicket, Collingwood trapped low and there wasn't much deliberating needed to give that one out
another yorker greets Flintoff, who waits before driving smoothly out to mid-on
another full delivery driven out to Mr Hussey-Cricket in the covers, but still enough time for an easy single
fuller delivery but gets away with it courtesy of Symonds' stop in the covers
low delivery, huge sweep and a big shout for lbw, turned down
down the track and through the covers for a booming cover drive
driven to mid-on for a quick single
outside off, full, and driven strongly past Symonds for four
outside off again, backs away to give himself room to cut to Hayden who's sweeping up on off
straight delivery swept hard, but not quite timed, down to the man at deep backward of square
full toss on leg, pulled out to the midwicket boundary, the return from Hayden has Lee backing into Pietersen at the non-striker's to take it, but he's OK
thumping cover drive aimed between mid-off and cover and Hussey gets a hand on it, stands up, runs again and tries to recover but the ball runs on
carved away through backward point
outside off, swing in the air, and worked down through backward point again
horrible full toss but a nagging height, Flintoff can only bring his hands down on it late, cramped a bit for room, and so a single is all that's available
backed away and driven off the back foot to cover, where a direct shy from Symonds would have been close
the dangerman has gone, that's the biggest wicket yet, cleaned up with a full delivery as he stepped to leg, almost yorking himself
comes from wide of the crease, worked into the covers
goes back onto tiptoes and offers a very straight bat to a defensive
full toss driven hard to cover for a quick single
on leg, Shah works his way over to play off his toes in front of square
on leg, full, Flintoff tries to turn it towards midwicket but it's a little fuller than he was expecting and rushes through the shot
on off, good length, Shah tries - and misses - the drive
another play and a miss, two dots all in a row
driven out to mid-on now to bring Flintoff back on strike
drags it a touch short, Flintoff rocks back and cuts out to Hodge at deep cover
down the track and has to readjust at the last minute to cut into the covers
driven back to the bowler who dives across to pick the ball up
short of a length and punished with a huge straight drive
thinks about it and turns in front of square
down the track to meet a shortish one and the second straight-driven six this over
driven to the covers for a quick single
on leg, played down off the hips
veering down leg, tries the pull-whip - and misses - Gilchrist snapping up behind the sticks
outside off, driven through extra cover and some good running back for the second
on leg, pulled aerially and lands just short of the fielder at deep square, plugging as usual
across the right hander, a touch of room, and driven back out to long-off
very wide and some kind of improvisation for Flintoff who plays on one foot, the other leg way up in the air
steps over to off to zoom right back in front of midwicket with a shouldersome pull
tries to be clever and run the ball up and over the vacant first slip but it's held by Clark at a shortish third man
took the pace off the ball, just outside off, Mascarenhas goes to strike it but misses
slow again, dipping full delivery, Mascarenhas can only get over it and drive back down the track
taking the pace off is a good method, and this happens again, Mascarenhas driving into the covers to get off the mark
wheels are coming off - Shah holes out now, this time to a sanother slow delivery over in front of deep midwicket
driven out to long-on for a quick single
on middle, driven out to short midwicket, a diresct shy and he would have been long gone
driven out straight
too good, Clark planting the ball across the left hander who pokes at it
fuller delivery, driven out to mid-off for an easy single
yorker, driven out to mid-on
great catch, Gilchrist dives to his left - and seems to be suspended there - making great ground to hold the thick edge with one outstretched glove
unfortunate dismissal in some ways... Mascarenhas charging down the track in backing up and Broad's straight drive takes a nick from Clark's down-pointing fingers
driven straight now
outside off, up in the blockhole, driven straight to long-off
driven back to the bowler
a huge swish outside leg and appeal for an edge through - turned down
slower ball, Kirtley offers bat to it late but gets a single to gully
and that's that, Broad cleaned up going for a huge one, driving an inside edge back on to the stumps
